code: @Manual{,   title = {remmy: API Client for Lemmy},   author = {Long Nguyen},   year = {2023},   note = {https://github.com/long39ng/remmy, https://long39ng.github.io/remmy/}, }

title: API Client for Lemmy
text: HTTP API client Lemmy R. Code documentation generated official JavaScript client source. Lemmy version: 0.18.1

title: API Client for Lemmy
text: can install development version remmy GitHub :

title: API Client for Lemmy
code: library(remmy)  lemmy_get_comment(546564)$comment_view$comment$content #> [1] "I am not by nature a sentimental person regarding software but I will truly miss RiF."

title: API Client for Lemmy
text: Source code generation made possible : ts-morph navigating TypeScript AST official JavaScript client source extracting HTTP request methods JSON. jsonlite parsing objects JSON R. rlang (metaprogramming capabilities R) programmatically generating function definitions parameter return type documentation.

what: remmy: API Client for Lemmy — remmy-package
title: remmy: API Client for Lemmy — remmy-package
text: HTTP API client Lemmy (https://github.com/LemmyNet/lemmy) R. Code documentation generated official JavaScript client source (https://github.com/LemmyNet/lemmy-js-client).

title: remmy: API Client for Lemmy — remmy-package
